readable.title: 2676937700_456134c7b5
readable.content: A man in a kilt follows a girl and another man in a kilt and holds a girl wearing silver shoes . Group of people walking around outdoors , one girl is being carried . One woman is being carried behind three people who are walking on path . People walking on a sidewalk , with one carrying a female . These people are walking away from the camera , while one person carries another .
